description: Experienced Colchester United defender Kaspars Gorkss moves to Crete-based Greek league side Ergotelis.
title: Colchester United: Kaspars Gorkss leaves for Ergotelis
title_page: Colchester United: Kaspars Gorkss leaves for Ergotelis - BBC Sport
maintext:
Experienced Colchester United defender Kaspars Gorkss has moved to Crete-based Greek Superleague side Ergotelis.
The Latvia international, 33, had been on a short-term contract with the U's but has now signed an 18-month deal with Ergotelis.
He made nine appearances for Colchester, scoring once, and manager Tony Humes had hoped he would stay on.
Humes said: "Kaspars has done exactly what we needed from him and it's disappointing he has decided to go."
